description:
Equip this outfit to cosplay as Sara, chief maid at Edinburgh, the orthodox maid cafe, from AKIBA'S TRIP: Hellbound & Debriefed.
This DLC will unlock the outfit for purchase in-game.

This DLC includes the following costume items:
Sara's Broom (weapon)
Sara's White Headdress (headgear)
Sara's Blouse (upper wear)
Sara's Skirt (lower wear)
Sara's Underwear (underwear)
Sara's Pumps (footwear)

*You will need the base game (sold separately) and the latest version of the software to use this DLC.
name: Sara's Outfit
